Sketch On the XY plane of the new coordinate system, create a rectangle with two loops as follows: * Loop 1: Draw lines from point (0.0, 0.0) to (0.075, 0.0), (0.075, 0.0) to (0.075, 0.15), (0.075, 0.15) to (0.0, 0.15), and (0.0, 0.15) to (0.0, 0.0). * Loop 2: Draw lines from point (0.0094, 0.0094) to (0.0656, 0.0094), (0.0656, 0.0094) to (0.0656, 0.1406), (0.0656, 0.1406) to (0.0094, 0.1406), and (0.0094, 0.1406) to (0.0094, 0.0094). Extrusion Extrude the sketch by 0.75 units along the normal direction and by 0 units along the opposite direction. Set the sketch scaling parameter to 0.15. Part 2 Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system with Euler Angles of [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and Translation Vector of [0.0328, 0.0, 0.0328]. Sketch On the XY plane of the new coordinate system, create a circle with the following properties: * Center: (0.0422, 0.0422) * Radius: 0.0422 Extrusion Extrude the sketch by 0 units along the normal direction and by 0.075 units along the opposite direction. Set the sketch scaling parameter to 0.0844. Part 3 Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system with Euler Angles of [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and Translation Vector of [0.4359, 0.0, 0.0328]. Sketch On the XY plane of the new coordinate system, create a circle with the following properties: * Center: (0.0422, 0.0422) * Radius: 0.0422 Extrusion Extrude the sketch by 0 units along the normal direction and by 0.1785 units along the opposite direction. Set the sketch scaling parameter to 0.0844. Final Shape The final shape is a rectangular prism with two circular holes on opposite sides. The prism has dimensions of approximately 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height. The circular holes have a radius of 0.5 units and are centered at a distance of 0.75 units from the base of the prism along the height direction. The holes have a height of 0.075 units and extend from the base to the top of the prism.</description>

Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Draw a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. Within this sketch, create a single face (face\\_1) using the following loop (loop\\_1): * line\\_1: Starting at [0.0, 0.0] and ending at [0.75, 0.0] * line\\_2: Starting at [0.75, 0.0] and ending at [0.75, 0.1652] * line\\_3: Starting at [0.75, 0.1652] and ending at [0.0, 0.1652] * line\\_4: Starting at [0.0, 0.1652] and ending at [0.0, 0.0] Close the loop to form a complete face. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75.
